items.title: Grim geniet van Steur, maar heeft ook een specifiek verbeterpunt
items.summary: Fred Grim genoot zondag weer van Sean Steur bij Ajax. De talentvolle middenvelder trok het spel bij vlagen naar zich toe tegen Telstar, maar zijn trainer heeft wel een specifiek verbeterpunt voor hem.

items.title: VI Live: warmdraaien voor El Cl√°sico in de finale van Spaanse Supercopa
items.summary: Welkom in de VI Live op deze ijskoude zondag 11 januari. Volg hier de ontwikkelingen binnen en buiten de grenzen, met op deze plek onder meer aandacht voor de Eredivisie, de finale van de Super Cup tussen Barcelona en Real Madrid en het FA Cup-toernooi.

items.title: Two for Reed as Mansfield upset Sheff Utd in thriller
items.summary: Mansfield Town cause one of the shocks of the FA Cup third round with a stunning victory over Sheffield United in a seven-goal thriller at Bramall Lane.

items.title: Bayern verpulvert Wolfsburg dankzij swingend buitenspelersduo
items.summary: Bayern M√ºnchen is het nieuwe jaar swingend begonnen. Mede dankzij het ongrijpbare buitenspelersduo Michael Olise en Luis D√≠az verpulverde Der Rekordmeister VfL Wolfsburg in eigen huis met grote cijfers.

items.title: Brighton zorgt op Old Trafford voor nieuw hoofdstuk in rampjaar United
items.summary: Brighton & Hove Albion heeft Manchester United een nieuwe teleurstelling bezorgd. Zes dagen na het ontslag van manager R√∫ben Amorim volgde de uitschakeling in het FA Cup-toernooi. Op eigen veld ging de dertienvoudig winnaar pijnlijk onderuit.

items.title: Manchester United v Brighton: FA Cup third round ‚Äì live

Cunha wanders infield and curls a marvellous long pass to put Dalot through on goal. He scampers into the area and is denied by the outrushing Steele. Dalot needed to lift it but his first touch was slightly heavy and that allowed Steele to close the gap. Continue reading...

items.title: Spoedherstel een feit: Mbapp√© op de bank tijdens finale tegen Barcelona
items.summary: Kylian Mbapp√© begint zondagavond op de bank bij Real Madrid in de finale van de Spaanse Supercopa tegen Barcelona. Sneller dan verwacht is de Fransman na zijn knieblessure teruggekeerd bij De Koninklijke .

items.title: Arsenal beat Portsmouth thanks to Martinelli hat-trick
items.summary: Gabriel Martinelli scores the first hat-trick of his senior career as an Arsenal side showing 10 changes come from a goal down to beat Championship side Portsmouth 4-1 in the FA Cup third round.

items.title: 'Big personality' Martinelli goes from 'idiot' to hat-trick hero
items.summary: Gabriel Martinelli was branded an "idiot" a few days ago - but showed great personality to respond with an FA Cup hat-trick, according to Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta.

items.title: Taty Castellanos edges West Ham past QPR in FA Cup to offer respite for Nuno
items.summary: Forget the magic of the FA Cup, for West Ham the reality of what is likely to be a Championship fixture next season. An indicator that life in the second tier will be no cakewalk. That QPR took them to extra-time will do little for Nuno Esp√≠rito Santo‚Äôs standing, despite a first win since 8 November. There were, though, positives to take in the performance of Taty Castellanos, the Argentinian striker who scored the Hammers‚Äô winning goal. Have West Ham at last ended a search for a striker that has lasted almost as long as their London Stadium tenancy? They‚Äôve looked everywhere. The other goalscorer, Crysencio Summerville, who also supplied the assist for the winner, put in one of his better West Ham performances, too. For one cold afternoon only, the Cup could draw a thin veil over Premier League concerns. Continue reading...

items.title: Mansfield stun Sheff Utd as Norwich, West Brom, Hull advance in FA Cup
items.summary: Two goals from Louis Reed against his former club helped Mansfield to a shock 4-3 victory at Sheffield United in the FA Cup.

items.title: Martinelli hat-trick as Arsenal beat Portsmouth in FA Cup
items.summary: Gabriel Martinelli scored a hat-trick as Arsenal overcame an early scare to thrash Championship strugglers Portsmouth 4-1 in the FA Cup third round.

items.title: Liverpool's Bradley out for season with knee injury
items.summary: Liverpool defender Conor Bradley is set to miss the rest of the season after suffering a serious knee injury in Thursday's 0-0 draw with Arsenal.

items.title: USMNT's Pepi suffers broken arm scoring for PSV
items.summary: United States striker Ricardo Pepi suffered a broken forearm while in action for PSV Eindhoven on Saturday and and is set to be sidelined for two months, the Dutch club has confirmed..

items.title: Salah scores to set up AFCON reunion with Man√©
items.summary: Mohamed Salah scored his fourth goal of the Africa Cup of Nations as Egypt defeated defending champions Ivory Coast 3-2 in Agadir.

items.title: Buoyant Rosenior lauds 5-star Chelsea start
items.summary: New Chelsea head coach Liam Rosenior promised more to come from his second string after they swept aside Charlton 5-1 at the Valley in his first match in charge.

items.title: Castellanos' first goal ends West Ham's winless run with victory over QPR
items.summary: Taty Castellanos scored his first goal for West Ham to end their 10-game winless run with a 2-1 victory after extra time over Championship side Queens Park Rangers in the FA Cup third round.

items.title: Gabriel Martinelli hat-trick guides Arsenal to win at stubborn Portsmouth
items.summary: Gabriel Martinelli ended Arsenal‚Äôs last game as public enemy No 1 with Liverpool fans and Gary Neville after his clash with Conor Bradley on Thursday. But the Brazilian was his team‚Äôs saviour against Portsmouth, after the Championship side had threatened briefly to record their first win against the Premier League leaders in 23 attempts after Colby Bishop‚Äôs early strike. Martinelli‚Äôs first senior hat‚Äëtrick included two almost identical headers from corners after an own goal from Andre Dozzell had drawn them level following ‚Äì you guessed it ‚Äì another corner. That takes Arsenal‚Äôs tally from set‚Äëpieces this season to 17 and one wonders where they would be without them. Yet such is their proficiency under Nicolas Jover these days that Mikel Arteta can virtually rely on at least one bearing fruit. Continue reading...

items.title: Martinelli scores hat-trick as Arsenal see off Pompey
items.summary: Gabriel Martinelli responded to his recent criticism by scoring a hat-trick for Arsenal in their 4-1 comeback win over Portsmouth to reach the FA Cup fourth round.

items.title: Leeds avoid upset with second-half comeback against Derby
items.summary: James Justin scored his first goal for Leeds United since joining from Leicester City in the summer, in a second-half comeback after Derby County took the lead thanks to a Ben Brereton Diaz strike.
